title: List of Catholic churches in the United States
data: Basilica of the National Shrine of the Immaculate Conception
400 Michigan Ave. , NE 38°56′0″N 77°0′02″W / 38.93333°N 77.00056°W / 38.93333 ; -77.00056 ( Basilica of the National Shrine of the Immaculate Conception )
The shrine is the largest Catholic church in the United States , the eighth largest religious structure in the world , and the tallest building in Washington , D.C
Cathedral of St. Matthew the Apostle
1725 Rhode Island Ave. , NW 38°54′22″N 77°2′24″W / 38.90611°N 77.04000°W / 38.90611 ; -77.04000 ( Cathedral of St. Matthew the Apostle , Washington , D.C . )

Seat of the Archdiocese of Washington , which was created from the Archdiocese of Baltimore in 1947 . The Renaissance Revival and Romanesque Revival structure was designed by New York architect Christopher Grant LaFarge
Franciscan Monastery and Memorial Church of the Holy Land
1400 Quincy St. N.E . 38°56′15″N 76°59′7.1″W / 38.93750°N 76.985306°W / 38.93750 ; -76.985306 ( Mount St. Sepulchre Franciscan Monastery )
The complex includes a monastery , Neo-Byzantine style church , gardens , replicas of various shrines throughout Israel , a replica of the catacombs in Rome , an archive and a library
Parish of the Archdiocese of Washington . It was founded in 1794
711 N Street , NW 38°54′26″N 77°1′22″W / 38.90722°N 77.02278°W / 38.90722 ; -77.02278 ( Immaculate Conception Catholic Church , Washington , D.C . )
Parish of the Archdiocese of Washington . It was founded in 1864
19 I St. , NW ( at N. Capitol St. ) 38°54′5″N 77°0′36″W / 38.90139°N 77.01000°W / 38.90139 ; -77.01000 ( St. Aloysius Church , Washington , D.C . )
Former parish of the Archdiocese of Washington . It was founded in 1857 and was merged with Holy Redeemer Parish in 2012
Parish of the Archdiocese of Washington , founded in 1920 . Contributing property in the Grant Circle Historic District
Byzantine Style ; modeled after the Ravenna Cathedral of Italy
intro: This is a list of notable Catholic churches and cathedrals in the United States.
